channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Play Framework Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Play Framework Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2200|2024-08-04T07:01:41.254Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20play%20framework%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Play Framework Plugin 1.0.2 and earlier lets users specify the path to the `play` command on the Jenkins master for a form validation endpoint, resulting in an OS command injection vulnerability exploitable by users able to store such a file on the Jenkins master.
